com.oose2015.group13.backend

Class GameService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oose2015.group13.backend.GameService

  • public class GameService
extends java.lang.Object
    GameService acts as an interface between the GameController and all the functions related to the game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameService(java.lang.String DataSource)
      This is the constructor for the GameService and initializes/opens the database

      This function returns the result of the last move, values are taken from an enum and can either be HIT,SINK,MISS

      • move

        public Result move(java.lang.String fromPlayerID,
                   java.lang.String toPlayerID,
                   java.lang.Integer x,
                   java.lang.Integer y)
        This function returns the result of the last move, values are taken from an enum and can either be HIT,SINK,MISS
        Parameters:
        fromPlayerID - ID of player making the movie
        toPlayerID - ID of player being attacked
        x - X coordinate of tile being attacked
        y - Y coordinate of tile being attacked
        Returns:
        Result

      • joinGame

        public Game joinGame(java.lang.String userID,
                     java.lang.String gameType,
                     java.lang.String boardLayout)
        This function returns the game value to the new user who's joining the game
        Parameters:
        userID - ID of player joining the game
        gameType - Specifies whether game is single/multi player
        boardLayout - Selected board layout of the user
        Returns:
        Game
